title: How many Gigabytes or amount of space does League take up
body: I have been trying to re download League but it keeps saying error and I think it may be that I have no more space to take  the updates so I just wanna know to see whether that is the issue or its something else

replies.body: Per the[ recommended specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements)guide, the suggested available space on your hard drive is 12gb.  This can offer some wiggle room with new content and patches.  I hope that helps!
Thank you I really appreciate the help
